The origins of Art Deco can be traced back to the 1925 Exposition Internationale des Arts Décoratifs et Industriels Modernes held in Paris, where the style made its grand debut. subDescription: Exploring how AI is revolutionizing HR and what it means for the future. AI can help HR professionals leverage its advantages while addressing potential challenges.
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is reshaping HR practices by automating routine tasks, enhancing recruitment processes, and providing deeper insights into employee performance.
